links.title: Get Custom Error Responses
links.description: Fetches all Custom Error Responses in a zone.

links.title: Update Custom Error Responses
links.description: Updates the Custom Error Responses of a zone.
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/rulesets/phases/http_custom_errors/entrypoint" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"description":"My ruleset to execute managed rulesets","rules":[{"description":"Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1","expression":"ip.src ne 1.1.1.1","action":"execute","action_parameters":{"id":"4814384a9e5d4991b9815dcfc25d2f1f"},"ref":"my_ref","enabled":"true","logging":{"enabled":"true"}}]}'

description.example: Execute the OWASP ruleset when the IP address is not 1.1.1.1

expression.description: The expression of the rule to match traffic on

action.description: The action to take when the rule matches

action_parameters.description: The parameters to configure the given action

ref.description: A reference for the rule, defaults to the ID

enabled.description: Whether the rule should be run

logging.description: The parameters to configure how the rule generates logs

enabled.description: Whether a log should be generated when the rule matches

name.description: The human-readable name of the ruleset.

phase.description: The phase where the ruleset is executed.

action.description: The action to perform when the rule expression matches.

description.example: Change error response based on geolocation

action_parameters.description: The action parameters for the serve_error action

content.description: The new content for the response error

content_type.description: The content-type of the response error

status_code.description: The HTTP status code of the response error

object_definition.title: Custom Error Responses
